title: Orlando Family Disney Vacation
description: Family vacation with two children (ages 6 and 9), focusing on Disney World and Universal Studios. Vegetarian-friendly accommodations needed.

segments.name: Disney Magic Kingdom Full Day
segments.description: Full day at Magic Kingdom. Recommended strategy: Arrive early, prioritize popular rides like Space Mountain and Seven Dwarfs Mine Train. Consider FastPass/Genie+ for key attractions. Plan for vegetarian meal options.
segments.notes: Vegetarian dining available at locations like Columbia Harbour House and Cosmic Ray's Starlight Cafe. Bring snacks for 6 and 9-year-old children.
